claim(uint256).details: Allows users to claim rewards for a specific application.

setAllowClaim(bool).details: Sets the allowClaim flag. Only the owner can call this function.

params._allowClaim: The new value for the allowClaim flag.

updateAvsSubmitContractAddress(address).details: Updates the AVS Submit contract address. Only the owner can call this function.

params._newAvsSubmitContractAddress: The new address of the AVS Submit Contract.

updateProgramContractAddress(address).details: Updates the program contract address. Only the owner can call this function.

params._newProgramContractAddress: The new address of the ProgramContract.

updateReward(uint256[],uint256[]).details: Updates the reward amount for multiple applications. Only the AVS Submit Contract can call this function.

params._additionalRewards: An array of additional rewards to be added.
